metadata.title: CVE-2019-19555 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description:
read_textobject in read.c in Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7b has a stack-based bufferoverflow because of an incorrect sscanf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19555` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7b-3ubuntu1').
